description.oldValue:
Closed Captions will now be supported for embedded videos in PowerPoint Live for Teams. If the video contains out-of-band closed captions, all viewers will automatically have the option to turn closed captions on for the video.
GA date: March CY2023
description.newValue:
Closed Captions will now be supported for
embedded videos in PowerPoint Live for Teams. If the video contains out-of-band
closed captions, all viewers will automatically have the option to turn closed
captions on for the video.
